/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, adorned with orange leaves, add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The image appears to have been captured during the day, as indicated by the bright and vibrant colors.
